[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:11, topic:549126”][quote author=Darwinscape link=topic=668034.msg4467675#msg4467675 date=1421051792]
Thanks but tbh I’m not really worried about a bunch of naysayers who judge the entire server by it’s advertisement thread. If they aren’t willing to join and experience it, or are on the downside about everything, honestly we don’t want them to be a part of our positive community.
[/quote]
I’m just giving feedback. You do whatever you want with it.
Use it, ignore it, hate it, whatever.

Good luck on your server, regardless.[/quote]

Thank you for the feedback.

item.title: Darwinscape - The Perfect Balance [Economy/Skilling/PVM/PVP]
item.dc:creator: @Darwinscape Darwinscape
item.description:
@Darwinscape wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:549126”][quote author=Darwinscape link=topic=668034.msg4467672#msg4467672 date=1421050896]
:palm: Neither of you have entered the server to experience the unique content for yourself. Plenty of players have joined, and all have seemed to understand why it is unique. We’ve had nothing but positive feedback thus far. Gf though mate.
[/quote]
Your advertisement is what draws the players. Create a better advertisement, and you’ll get better feedback on it.

If anything, this feedback is doing you a favor more than it is hurting you, because your server is still new, so you have plenty of time to change it up and etc before players think that it’s just “another server”.
Because that’s what it looks like.[/quote]

Thanks but tbh I’m not really worried about a bunch of naysayers who judge the entire server by it’s advertisement thread. If they aren’t willing to join and experience it, or are on the downside about everything, honestly we don’t want them to be a part of our positive community.

Read full topic

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Darwinscape:

:palm: Neither of you have entered the server to experience the unique content for yourself. Plenty of players have joined, and all have seemed to understand why it is unique. We’ve had nothing but positive feedback thus far. Gf though mate.

Your advertisement is what draws the players. Create a better advertisement, and you’ll get better feedback on it.

If anything, this feedback is doing you a favor more than it is hurting you, because your server is still new, so you have plenty of time to change it up and etc before players think that it’s just “another server”.
Because that’s what it looks like.

item.title: Darwinscape - The Perfect Balance [Economy/Skilling/PVM/PVP]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:6, topic:549126”]This advertisement reminds me of the ones that were made in like 2007, 2008, and possibly 2009 because of you advertising hellhounds, abbysal demons and all the other basic stuff that is basically supplied in a server already nowadays (potful when you think about it).

Anyway, if you’re going to advertise then advertise something that would catch the eye because none of this seems like it would attract my attention for more than 10 minutes - just saying.[/quote]

This… You’re advertising content that comes rather standard in server’s now-a-days… That isn’t “unique”…

Also, half of your “never before seen” content is you cheaphacking a way around not adding new maps or etc (from what I’ve seen).

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/23284976/screenshots/Darwinscape%20screenshot%20100.png < That one, for example. Why not just add the correct maps and use the real GWD?
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/23284976/screenshots/Darwinscape%20screenshot%2036.png < what’s with the titles? “Fully working” should mean your right click box should only be a few pixels wider than the longest line of text. Not covering the entire chat box…

There are very few features listed here that seem appealing…

You don’t need pictures of skilling, again, it’s something that’s seen in all servers. If you added a unique twist to the skills (And the RC chests don’t count), then show it off. Onto my point of the RC-chests… What are the point of them? You could just use the real altars…
Way back when allstar’s were “all the rage” they typically consisted of 1 single skilling zone (basically what you’ve shown) where you trained just about ever skill besides combat. Only difference between yours and an allstar is yours gives items, not cash.

Overall: 5/10. Maybe. This server reminds me of an allstar, sorry.
[size=4pt]and yes, I did nitpick a bit.[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Darwinscape - The Perfect Balance [Economy/Skilling/PVM/PVP]

Anyway, if you’re going to advertise then advertise something that would catch the eye because none of this seems like it would attract my attention for more than 10 minutes - just saying.
